Package Tekiz._DPSCalculator._DPSCalculator.services.manager

Class WeaponManager

java.lang.Object
Tekiz._DPSCalculator._DPSCalculator.services.manager.WeaponManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
LoadoutScopeClearable
@Service @Scope(scopeName="loadout") public class WeaponManager extends Object implements LoadoutScopeClearable
A service used to manage Weapon objects.

  • Constructor Details

    • WeaponManager

      @Autowired public WeaponManager(WeaponLoaderService weaponLoaderService, ModLoaderService modLoaderService, org.springframework.context.ApplicationEventPublisher applicationEventPublisher)
      The constructor for a WeaponManager object.
      Parameters:
      weaponLoaderService - A service used to load and create Weapon objects.
      modLoaderService - A service used to load and create RangedMod objects.
      applicationEventPublisher - The event publisher for dispatching WeaponChangedEvents.

  • Method Details

    • setWeapon

      public void setWeapon(String weaponName) throws IOException
      Loads a weapon by its name and sets it as the current weapon. If the weapon is successfully loaded, a WeaponChangedEvent is published.
      Parameters:
      weaponName - The name of the weapon to load.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the weapon cannot be loaded.

    • modifyWeapon

      public void modifyWeapon(String modName, ModType modType) throws IOException
      Modifies the current weapon by applying a specified modification (mod), such as changing the receiver of a ranged weapon. After modification, a WeaponChangedEvent is published.
      Parameters:
      modName - The name of the mod to apply.
      modType - The type of mod being applied (e.g., receiver).
      Throws:
      IOException - If the mod cannot be loaded.

    • clear

      @PreDestroy public void clear()
      A method used during the cleanup of this service.
      Specified by:
      clear in interface LoadoutScopeClearable
